title: New Holland LX865 Skid Steer: How to Flush Water-Contaminated Hydraulic Oil & Prevent Future Issues.

tasks.task: Drain and flush New Holland hydraulic reservoir and lines.
subtasks: Remove dipstick and siphon contaminated oil.
Use small electric pump to extract oil from reservoir.
Inspect reservoir cap filter and gasket for water ingress.
Replace damaged gasket with silicone sealant.
Check and secure reservoir cover with plastic container and silicone seal.
Refill reservoir with clean hydraulic fluid.
Change hydraulic filter and ensure breather filter integrity.

tasks.task: Prevent future water ingress into reservoir.
subtasks: Install custom gaskets and silicone sealant in reservoir cover.
Secure reservoir cover with plastic container seal.
